nodes.text: The King's Requiem was a short narrative written by Peter M. Schweighofer and published in the Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook.

King Haxim, ruler of Falleen, sat in his royal gardens as he awaited his death. A flesh-eating bacterium had befallen his people, stemming from an Imperial research facility on the planet. He thought of his wayward son, Prince Xizor, as he watched the Imperial Navy open fire on Falleen in an attempt to stop the spread of the disease.
